    Serialized Form

    • Package <Unnamed>

      • Class ArrowPanel

        class ArrowPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • activeNews
            List<ScrollingNews> activeNews
            List of currently active scrolling news messages.
          • Background
            Color Background
            Background color for the UI panel.
          • buyersStatsWindow
            CustomWindowPanel buyersStatsWindow
            Stats panel window showing real-time statistics of buyers.
          • candleHistory
            List<Candle> candleHistory
            Historical candlestick data derived from priceHistory.
          • customTradeWindow
            CustomWindowPanel customTradeWindow
            Trade panel window to display and interact with trading simulation.
          • downButton
            JButton downButton
            Button to decrease the market price manually.
          • lastDisplayedNews
            String lastDisplayedNews
            Last news message displayed (to avoid repetition).
          • marketCapLabel
            JLabel marketCapLabel
            Displays calculated market capitalization.
          • marketStateLabel
            JLabel marketStateLabel
            Displays current state of the market (e.g., Stable, Crashing).
          • MAXVALS
            int MAXVALS
            Maximum number of historical values stored for rendering.
          • newsScrollTimer
            Timer newsScrollTimer
            Timer that drives the scrolling animation for news items.
          • newsX
            int newsX
            X-position used for horizontally scrolling news items.
          • pauseButton
            JButton pauseButton
            Button to pause/resume the simulation.
          • priceHistory
            List<Double> priceHistory
            Historical raw price values for graph rendering.
          • showCandles
            boolean showCandles
            Whether to show candlestick chart.
          • showLine
            boolean showLine
            Whether to show the line graph of price history.
          • stock
            StockMarket stock
            Reference to the main stock market simulation object.
          • tempHigh
            double tempHigh
            Tracks the highest price since the last candlestick was created.
          • tempLow
            double tempLow
            Tracks the lowest price since the last candlestick was created.
          • tempOpen
            double tempOpen
            Temporary opening value used when creating a new candlestick.
          • tickCounter
            int tickCounter
            Ticks counted since the last candlestick was added.
          • timediff
            int timediff
            Time interval multiplier for simulation updates.
          • timeLabel
            JLabel timeLabel
            Displays simulated time (e.g., Year, Day, Hour).
          • totalTicks
            int totalTicks
            Total number of simulation ticks passed (for time tracking).
          • trimHistory
            boolean trimHistory
            Whether to trim historical data to improve performance.
          • upButton
            JButton upButton
            Button to increase the market price manually.
          • valueLabel
            JLabel valueLabel
            Displays current stock value.

      • Class CustomWindowPanel

        class CustomWindowPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • exitOnClose
            boolean exitOnClose
            Determines whether the application should exit the simulation or close the frame when the close button is clicked.
          • frame
            JFrame frame
            The underlying JFrame that contains this panel and manages the window display.
          • isFullscreen
            boolean isFullscreen
            Indicates whether the window is currently in fullscreen mode.
          • windowedBounds
            Rectangle windowedBounds
            Stores the window's bounds before switching to fullscreen mode, so it can be restored when exiting fullscreen.

      • Class SimulatedTradePanel

        class SimulatedTradePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • amountField
            JTextField amountField
            Input field where the user specifies the number of shares to buy or sell in a simulated trade.
          • buyButton
            JButton buyButton
            Button that triggers the simulation of a buy action based on the amount entered.
          • cash
            double cash
            Virtual cash balance available to simulate purchases. Starts with an initial value of $1000.
          • cashLabel
            JLabel cashLabel
            Label displaying the current amount of virtual cash available to the user.
          • priceLabel
            JLabel priceLabel
            Label that displays the current stock price from the market.
          • profitLabel
            JLabel profitLabel
            Label showing the net profit or loss from simulated trading.
          • sellButton
            JButton sellButton
            Button that triggers the simulation of a sell action based on the amount entered.
          • sharesLabel
            JLabel sharesLabel
            Label that shows the number of shares owned by the user in the simulation.
          • simulatedShares
            int simulatedShares
            Tracks the number of shares currently "owned" in the simulation.
          • stockMarket
            StockMarket stockMarket
            Reference to the stock market from which current prices will be retrieved during buy/sell simulations.
          • totalRevenue
            double totalRevenue
            Total amount of money earned from selling shares during the simulation.
          • totalSpent
            double totalSpent
            Total amount of money spent on buying shares throughout the simulation.
